mean_cn: adj.笔直的；直达的；（联系等）直接的；  vt.指导，引导；  adv.直接地，径直地
mean_en: happening or done without involving other people, actions, etc. in between; going in the straightest line between two places without stopping or changing direction
sentence: The road in the middle is more direct than the others.
sentence_trans: 中间这条路比其他两条更直。
word_etyma: di使...变成 + rect直 → direct直接；直接的
